::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod woke up in his room. He didn't have anything to do, and he was
bored. He figured that since he would be spending alot of time with
Kamodia, he would get to know her better. He located her room, by the
computer. He walked to her room, and knocked on the door.
"Hey Kamodia, its Hot Rod. Want to go have a drink?"
